title: Basic Japanese
description: Learn the basic grammar and vocabulary of Japanese.

title: Greetings and Self-Introduction
description: Learn how to greet and introduce yourself in Japanese.

title: Daily Conversation
description: Learn phrases used in everyday Japanese conversation.

title: Numbers and Time
description: Learn how to count and express time in Japanese.

title: Shopping and Ordering
description: Learn how to shop and order at a restaurant in Japanese.

title: Asking for Directions
description: Learn how to ask for directions and explain locations in Japanese.

title: Transportation
description: Learn how to use public transportation like trains and buses in Japanese.

title: School Life
description: Learn vocabulary and phrases related to school life in Japan.

title: Workplace Communication
description: Learn phrases and etiquette used in the workplace in Japan.

title: Food Culture
description: Learn vocabulary related to Japanese food culture and cuisine.

title: Travel Preparation
description: Learn phrases and vocabulary needed for traveling in Japan.

title: Holidays and Events
description: Learn about Japanese holidays and traditional events.
